comment._content: I think this is he: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captain_Bill_McDonald At the time he was a bodyguard for Woodrow Wilson, so he's cleaned up a bit. He must have had some stories to tell.

comment._content: Thanks for making this connection. We'll add his full name to the record when we update.
